Comment 9: 
The spec really isn't clear, and that should be fixed. I'll open yet another BOM issue.
But the fact is, BOMs are illegal in the middle of Go files. That is what the compilers
implement. You can argue that that should not be the case, and you can argue that it's
not well documented, but that's the language as it is today.

The linking issue here, though, that's a problem that should be fixed, although it won't
be until after Go 1.1.
